Articles.Content:
Greetings!

My name's Theowulff Kerman and I'd like to link you my blog, [KERBAL SPACE PROGRAM 616](https://kerbalspaceprogram616.wordpress.com/), which follows my own adventure, on my Kerbin reality (one of many, too many alternate realities of this big *MultiVerse*).

The blog is in Italian bu you can easily translate it with the appropriate button on the menu.

Enjoy!

![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-27T15:29:34Z" title="05/27/2015 03:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 27, 2015</time> by Theowulff**
Welcome! I know we have tons of Italians here, so you'll feel at home. We also have the International Sub-Forum!

> 
> Welcome! I know we have tons of Italians here, so you'll feel at home. We also have the International Sub-Forum!

Hi, Dman979.

Thanks for the welcome reply ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I'll surely check the International Sub-Forum!

Thanks again ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-27T15:29:42Z" title="05/27/2015 03:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 27, 2015</time> by Theowulff**
Ayyy welcome to the KSP Community! Enjoy your stay ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Ayyy welcome to the KSP Community! Enjoy your stay ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks!

I'll surely enjoy this Community!

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-27T15:30:37Z" title="05/27/2015 03:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 27, 2015</time> by Theowulff**

Hey Theowulff and welcome to the forums!

I hope to see you around and all the best with your blog! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

*Arrivederci!*

> 
> Hey Theowulff and welcome to the forums!
> I hope to see you around and all the best with your blog! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Hi SpaceExplorer!

Thank you so much for the kind words!

You'll see me around. I promise ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> *Arrivederci!*

Ah!

*Arrivederci*, my friend! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Greetings, Theowulff, welcome aboard!

Thanks Starwhip!

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
